column1: The attack on Pearl Harbor was one of the most shocking attacks on US troops in American territory. On this day December 7th we remember and thank the brave men and women who defended our nation. #NeverForgotten #PearlHarbor https://t.co/zyR1c56oH7
May we always bring light wherever we go. Happy #Diwali to all those who celebrate! https://t.co/LuLf9o4UzQ
Wishing a meaningful Yom Kippur to everyone who is observing! https://t.co/oUGQgPs3QR

Health Care issues affect us all and determining the best means of addressing them is an important part of my work in Congress. This funding is one way of helping our families in Northeastern Pennsylvania to live healthy lives. https://t.co/4OAI4eNGdk https://t.co/df8ZxOzg7F

On this solemn day and every day we will #NeverForget the victims their families and the countless first responders who showed courage beyond measure in the aftermath of 9/11. #AlwaysRemember911 https://t.co/fJarlMqnaC
Happy Armed Forces Day. A day to pay special tribute to the men and women of the Armed Forces past and present thank you to everyone who has served. #ArmedForcesDay https://t.co/Gxafox8pe7
Honored to endorse my friend northeastern PA hometown boy Joe Biden for President https://t.co/1CCM41q8QF

I was happy to sit down for breakfast with our labor union members this weekend. We should be thankful to labor unions and their members for standing up for the middle class. #UnionStrong https://t.co/Wsp9thKJ7F

It’s time for the administration to stop holding American families & our economy hostage. Shutdowns should be off limits as a negotiating tool. #EndTheShutdown. America is simply less safe in a shutdown. https://t.co/k3xi9lNIUw

@TomBorthwick Tom-just saw this I support net neutrality 100%. The discharge petition that I did not sign was to use the Congressional Review Act to overturn an FCC ruling. I don’t support CRA legislation under any circumstance. The CRA was enacted as Newt Gingrich’s war on agency protections
